title: LEARN NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS / FASCINATION & MAGNETISM
description:
Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in the field of non-verbal hypnosis, he teaches his students the most powerful ancient techniques of Mesmerism and Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze, in modern times. He induces strong trances that lead the subjects to deep positive transformations. His non-verbal hypnosis school travels all around the world and he is willing to share his knowledge. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
 https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolinguistic  

Join our Italian channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching
